subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Minnesota Timberwolves fired Kurt Rambis on Tuesday, ending more than three months of uncertainty and awkwardness surrounding the coach of the worst team in the N.B.A. last season.
snippet: The Minnesota Timberwolves fired Kurt Rambis on Tuesday, ending more than three months of uncertainty and awkwardness surrounding the coach of the worst team in the N.B.A. last season.
